document.full_text: scott walker, wisconsin's newly elected republican governor, won his battle last week to get the curbs he backed on public-sector unions approved by the state legislature and signed into law.
document.title: wisconsin democrats say down but not out in union fight
lines_and_colors: scott walker, wisconsin's newly elected republican governor, won his battle last week to get the curbs he backed on public-sector unions approved by the state legislature and signed into law.
